content: this sweet and simple crocheted bonnet will warm little baby ears all year round the pattern has step by step pictures to show you how to crochet the bonnet and will make it an easy pattern for beginners as well as advanced crocheters this pattern is part of my collection of basic crocheted baby clothes materials yarn 50 gr llama soft balls 50gr 150m/164yards you could check yarnsub for an yarn that s easier for you to get your hands on hook 4 0mm scissors needle sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-9 months gauge 16 double_crochet x 9 row = 10x10cm 4 x4 to check your gauge start by chaining 18 1-9 starting in third chain from hook make 1 double_crochet in each st 16 chain 2 turn you square should now be 10x10cm 4 x4
